title: League Can't Patch
body: Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching. We're giving it another shot. In the meantime, you can check the status of our servers here. (Error code 003). Is this just me? Help pls!

replies.body: If your network is having problems getting a solid connection with our patching servers, it could be due to some weird network or firewall settings. There are a few different steps, but let's use our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to try and narrow down the main issue.
